meanings.definition: Excessive discharge of sebum from the sebaceous glands, causing oily skin or dandruff.
meanings.sent1: Seborrhea can lead to oily skin and dandruff.
meanings.sent2: My brother struggles with seborrhea, which makes his skin oily.
meanings.sent3: The seborrhea on his scalp made him look like he had just put oil in his hair.
meanings.sent4: Her face glistened with seborrhea, like a shiny mirror reflecting the sun.
meanings.sent5: The seborrhea on his skin was so excessive that it left greasy marks on everything he touched.

meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by red, itchy, scaly patches on the scalp or face.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with seborrhea after noticing the red patches on her face.
meanings.sent2: Seborrhea can cause uncomfortable itching and redness on the skin.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her seborrhea was like having a mini desert on her face.
meanings.sent4: The seborrhea on his scalp was a fiery map of discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The seborrhea on her face looked like tiny, angry volcanoes ready to erupt.
